message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, but I think I deserve more for making the first offer. Take it or leave it!
You're being greedy, but I'll give you a better deal. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. This is my last offer, take it!
You're really trying to squeeze me out, but I'll give you one more chance. Take it or leave it!
Fine, I'll give you a bigger share, but don't think I'm getting desperate!
